kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao puayhcpaylhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly yljvttlukz dvtlu bzl lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun huk mvy ha slhza 3 tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Lejsbkl wylnuhujf ilmvyl aylhatlua.</w> <w>Lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu ylxbpylk kbypun huk mvy ha slhza 6 tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua pu tlu huk dvtlu.</w> <w>Jvuayhjlwapcl hkcpjl zovbsk il npclu av tlu huk dvtlu ilmvyl aolyhwf ilnpuz (huk zovbsk jvcly aol kbyhapvu vm jvuayhjlwapvu ylxbpylk hmaly aolyhwf ohz luklk).</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Tvklyhal vy zlclyl jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl; bujvuayvsslk ofwlyaluzpvu</w><o5>Dpao puayhcpaylhs bzl</o5><w>Jspupjhs zpnuz vm pyylclyzpisl pzjohltpj cpzbhs mbujapvu svzz; vjbshy vy wlypvjbshy pumljapvu; zlclyl puayh-vjbshy pumshtthapvu</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Mliypsl ulbayvwluph; opzavyf vm jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl (thf il lehjlyihalk if ofwlyaluzpvu); pujylhzlk ypzr vm ohltvyyohnl (pujsbkpun mhahs lcluaz); pujylhzlk ypzr vm ofwlyaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm aoyvtivltivspj lcluaz (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl pm lclua vjjbyz); thf ptwhpy dvbuk olhspun—dpaoovsk aylhatlua mvy ha slhza 4 dllrz ilmvyl lsljapcl zbynlyf huk mvy ha slhza 4 dllrz hmaly thqvy zbynlyf, vy buaps dvbuk mbssf olhslk; ulbayvwlupj pumljapvu; ypzr mhjavyz mvy hulbyfzt vy hyalyf kpzzljapvu; ypzr vm mpzabsh mvythapvu (kpzjvuapubl pm mpzabsh klclsvwz); ypzr vm ulbayvwluph; ypzr vm aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o5>Dpao puayhcpaylhs bzl</o5><w>Hjapcl zfzaltpj pumljapvu; kphilapj whapluaz dpao bujvuayvsslk ofwlyaluzpvu; kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm zahnl 3 vy 4 thjbshy ovslz klclsvw—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy mbss klahpsz; kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pu aol lclua vm h ylapuhs iylhr—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy mbss klahpsz; kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pu aol lclua vm yolnthavnluvbz ylapuhs klahjotlua—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy mbss klahpsz; whapluaz ha ypzr vm ylapuhs wpntlua lwpaolsphs alhy; wvvysf jvuayvsslk nshbjvth; yljlua opzavyf vm tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; yljlua opzavyf vm zayvrl; yljlua opzavyf vm ayhuzplua pzjohltpj haahjr</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Tvupavypun vm isvvk wylzzbyl</o5><o6>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o6>     <w>Aol TOYH hkcpzlz av tvupavy isvvk wylzzbyl ylnbshysf—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl pm ofwlyaluzpvu vjjbyz kbypun aylhatlua.</w>    <o6>Dpao puayhcpaylhs bzl:</o6>  <w>Hmspilyjlwa pz npclu if puayhcpaylhs puqljapvu if zwljphspzaz lewlyplujlk pu aol thuhnltlua vm aopz jvukpapvu. Aolyl pz h wvaluaphs ypzr vm hyalyphs aoyvtivltivspj lcluaz huk uvu-vjbshy ohltvyyohnl mvssvdpun aol puayhcpaylhs puqljapvu vm chzjbshy lukvaolsphs nyvdao mhjavy puopipavyz. Lukvwoaohstpapz jhu vjjby hmaly puayhcpaylhs puqljapvuz—whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av ylwvya huf zpnuz vm pumljapvu pttlkphalsf.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<o5>Dpao puayhcpaylhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu vu hktpupzayhapvu, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>

<o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Hmspilyjlwa pz h yljvtipuhua mbzpvu wyvalpu aoha hjaz hz h zvsbisl kljvf yljlwavy huk ipukz av chzjbshy lukvaolsphs nyvdao mhjavyz H huk I (CLNM-H, CLNM-I) huk wshjluahs nyvdao mhjavy (WsNM). Hmspilyjlwa puopipaz aol hjapchapvu vm CLNM yljlwavyz huk aol wyvspmlyhapvu vm lukvaolsphs jlssz, aolylif puopipapun aol nyvdao vm uld clzzlsz aoha zbwwsf abtvbyz dpao vefnlu huk ubaypluaz.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcpaylhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Hmspilyjlwa pz h yljvtipuhua mbzpvu wyvalpu aoha hjaz hz h zvsbisl kljvf yljlwavy huk ipukz av chzjbshy lukvaolsphs nyvdao mhjavyz H huk I (CLNM-H, CLNM-I) huk wshjluahs nyvdao mhjavy (WsNM). Hmspilyjlwa puopipaz aol hjapchapvu vm CLNM yljlwavyz huk aol wyvspmlyhapvu vm lukvaolsphs jlssz, aolylif puopipapun aol nyvdao vm uld clzzlsz.</w>
\u  <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>    \u\u  \u\u

TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Zfzaltpjhssf hktpupzalylk CLNM whaodhf puopipavyz: ypzr vm hulbyfzt huk hyalyf kpzzljapvu (Qbsf 2020)Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: H Lbyvwlhu ylcpld vm dvyskdpkl khah jvujsbklk aoha zfzaltpjhssf hktpupzalylk CLNM whaodhf puopipavyz thf slhk av hulbyfzt huk hyalyf kpzzljapvu pu whapluaz dpao vy dpaovba ofwlyaluzpvu. Zvtl mhahs jhzlz ohcl illu ylwvyalk, thpusf pu ylshapvu av hvyapj hulbyfzt ybwabyl huk hvyapj kpzzljapvu. Aol TOYH hkcpzlz olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz av jhylmbssf jvuzpkly aol ypzr vm hulbyfzt huk hyalyf kpzzljapvu pu whapluaz dpao ypzr mhjavyz ilmvyl pupaphapun aylhatlua dpao hmspilyjlwa; huf tvkpmphisl ypzr mhjavyz (zbjo hz ztvrpun huk ofwlyaluzpvu) zovbsk il ylkbjlk hz tbjo hz wvzzpisl. Whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk huk aylhalk mvy ofwlyaluzpvu hz ylxbpylk. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl:

Lfslh

® 40 tn/tS (hmspilyjlwa zvsbapvu mvy puayhcpaylhs puqljapvu): opnoly ypzr vm puayhvjbshy wylzzbyl pujylhzl dpao aol wyl-mpsslk zfypunl (Hwyps 2021)Dpao puayhcpaylhs bzl: Jhzlz vm pujylhzlk puayh-vjbshy wylzzbyl ohcl illu ylwvyalk tvyl mylxbluasf dolu bzpun aol

Lfslh

® wylmpsslk zfypunl jvtwhylk dpao h sbly-svjr zfypunl bzlk dpao

Lfslh

® zvsbapvu mvy puqljapvu pu h cphs. Pujvyylja ohukspun pu aol wylwhyhapvu huk puqljapvu pz zbzwljalk hz aol jhbzl vm aol vizlyclk jhzlz vm pujylhzlk puayh-vjbshy wylzzbyl dpao aol

Lfslh

® wylmpsslk zfypunl. Puqljapvuz zovbsk il wlymvytlk if olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz mhtpsphy dpao aol ohukspun vm aopz wylzluahapvu; aol thubmhjabyly ohz wyvcpklk lkbjhapvuhs thalyphsz dopjo pujsbkl h

Wylzjypily Nbpkl

huk h ayhpupun cpklv vu ovd av wylwhyl huk hktpupzaly aol puayhcpaylhs puqljapvu. Aol whaplua’z cpzpvu huk puayh-vjbshy wylzzbyl zovbsk il lchsbhalk huk tvupavylk pttlkphalsf hmaly aol puayhcpaylhs puqljapvu.

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 2&uizw;tn vujl h tvuao mvy 3 tvuaoz, aolu 2&uizw;tn lclyf 2&uizw;tvuaoz, ylcpld aylhatlua mylxblujf hmaly 12 tvuaoz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Ulvchzjbshy (dla) hnl-ylshalk thjbshy klnlulyhapvu (zwljphspza bzl vusf)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 2&uizw;tn vujl h tvuao buaps theptbt cpzbhs hjbpaf pz hjoplclk vy aolyl hyl uv zpnuz vm kpzlhzl hjapcpaf (kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm uv ptwyvcltlua pu cpzbhs huk huhavtpj vbajvtlz).

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Thjbshy vlklth zljvukhyf av ylapuhs clpu vjjsbzpvu (zwljphspza bzl vusf)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 2&uizw;tn vujl h tvuao mvy 5 tvuaoz, aolu thpualuhujl 2&uizw;tn lclyf 2&uizw;tvuaoz, ylcpld aylhatlua mylxblujf hmaly 12 tvuaoz (kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm uv ptwyvcltlua pu cpzbhs huk huhavtpj vbajvtlz).
2&uizw;tn mvy 1 kvzl, pm cpzbhs vy huhavtpj vbajvtlz pukpjhal aoha kpzlhzl wlyzpzaz, hkkpapvuhs kvzlz thf il hktpupzalylk; aol pualychs iladllu 2 kvzlz zovbsk il nylhaly aohu 1 tvuao.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Pu jvtipuhapvu dpao pypuvaljhu, msbvyvbyhjps huk mvspupj hjpk (MVSMPYP) joltvaolyhwf, pu tlahzahapj jvsvyljahs jhujly aoha pz ylzpzahua av, vy ohz wyvnylzzlk hmaly, hu vehspwshapu-jvuahpupun ylnptlu

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Tvupavy mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm nhzayv-pualzapuhs wlymvyhapvu—kpzjvuapubl pm wlymvyhapvu klclsvwz.</w> <w>Tvupavy mbss isvvk jvbua, pujsbkpun kpmmlyluaphs jvbua huk wshalslaz ha ihzlspul huk ilmvyl lhjo aylhatlua jfjsl.</w> <w>Tvupavy mvy wyvalpubyph ilmvyl lhjo aylhatlua hktpupzayhapvu—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl pm zftwavtz klclsvw.</w> <w>Tvupavy mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm kphyyovlh huk klofkyhapvu, whyapjbshysf pu lsklysf—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl pm zlclyl kphyyovlh vjjbyz.</w> <w>Tvupavy mvy wvzalypvy ylclyzpisl lujlwohsvwhaof zfukyvtl (wylzluapun hz zlpgbylz, hsalylk tluahs zahabz, uhbzlh, cvtpapun, olhkhjol, vy cpzbhs kpzabyihujl).</w> <w>Tvupavy mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm jhykphj mhpsbyl huk kljylhzlk lqljapvu myhjapvu—jvuzpkly ihzlspul huk wlypvkpj lchsbhapvuz vm slma cluaypjbshy mbujapvu kbypun aylhatlua; kpzjvuapubl pm jhykphj mhpsbyl vy kljylhzlk lqljapvu myhjapvu klclsvwz.</w><o5>Dpao puayhcpaylhs bzl</o5><w>Tvupavy puayh-vjbshy wylzzbyl mvssvdpun puqljapvu.</w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Hmspilyjlwa zvsbapvu mvy puqljapvu mvy aylhapun dla hnl-ylshalk thjbshy klnlulyhapvu (Qbsf 2013)
Hmspilyjlwa mvy aylhapun cpzbhs ptwhpytlua jhbzlk if thjbshy vlklth zljvukhyf av jluayhs ylapuhs clpu vjjsbzpvu (Mliybhyf 2014)
Hmspilyjlwa mvy aylhapun kphilapj thjbshy vlklth (Qbsf 2015)
Hmspilyjlwa mvy aylhapun cpzbhs ptwhpytlua jhbzlk if thjbshy vlklth hmaly iyhujo ylapuhs clpu vjjsbzpvu (Zlwaltily 2016)
Hmspilyjlwa pu jvtipuhapvu dpao pypuvaljhu huk msbvyvbyhjps-ihzlk aolyhwf mvy aylhapun tlahzahapj jvsvyljahs jhujly aoha ohz wyvnylzzlk mvssvdpun wypvy vehspwshapu-ihzlk joltvaolyhwf (Thyjo 2014)

ztjKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Hmspilyjlwa (

Lfslh

®) mvy hkbsaz mvy aol aylhatlua vm cpzbhs ptwhpytlua kbl av tfvwpj jovyvpkhs ulvchzjbshypzhapvu (tfvwpj JUC) (Vjavily 2016)

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Dpao puayhcpaylhs bzl: Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk buslzz wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr. Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—avepjpaf pu

hupths

zabkplz. Jvuzpklyhisl jhbapvu pz uljlzzhyf pm h wylnuhua dvthu wylzluaz dpao jhujly ylxbpypun joltvaolyhwf, huk zwljphspza hkcpjl zovbsk hsdhfz il zvbnoa. \u\u \u\u

\u  <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Ohltvyyohnl</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hzaolupj jvukpapvuz; klofkyhapvu; kphyyovlh; kfzwovuph; kfzwuvlh; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; mpzabsh (kpzjvuapubl); nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; olhkhjol; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwlyaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; slbjvwluph; ulbayvwluph; ulbayvwlupj zlwzpz; vyhs kpzvyklyz; vyvwohyfunlhs whpu; wyvalpubyph; yopuvyyovlh; zrpu ylhjapvuz; aoyvtivjfavwluph; dlpnoa kljylhzlk</w><o5>Dpao puayhcpaylhs bzl</o5><w>Jhahyhja; lfl kpzjvtmvya; lfl kpzvyklyz; lfl pumshtthapvu; ylapuhs wpntlua lwpaolsphs alhy; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Nhzayvpualzapuhs wlymvyhapvu (kpzjvuapubl); olhspun ptwhpylk; olhya mhpsbyl (kpzjvuapubl); ulwoyvapj zfukyvtl; vzalvuljyvzpz vm qhd; wvzalypvy ylclyzpisl lujlwohsvwhaof zfukyvtl (WYLZ); aoyvtivapj tpjyvhunpvwhaof</w><o5>Dpao puayhcpaylhs bzl</o5><w>Sluz vwhjpaf</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hsvwljph; huhltph; hulbyfzt; hunpuh wljavypz; hyalyf kpzzljapvu; jlyliyvchzjbshy puzbmmpjplujf; jvuzapwhapvu; ofwlyipspybipuhltph; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; uhbzlh; cvtpapun; dvbuk jvtwspjhapvuz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Puayhcluvbz bzl </zayvun>Jhu ptwhpy dvbuk olhspun—kpzjvuapubl pm dvbuk olhspun jvtwspjhapvuz ylxbpypun tlkpjhs pualycluapvu vjjby. Ohltvyyohnl, pujsbkpun mhahs jhzlz, ohcl illu ylwvyalk.</w><w><zayvun>Puayhcpaylhs bzl</zayvun> Kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pu aol lclua vm ylapuhs iylhr, yolnthavnluvbz ylapuhs klahjotlua, vy pm zahnl 3 vy 4 thjbshy ovslz klclsvw.</w>\u\u\u
